short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a QR code from the current page URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create and Share QR Codes Instantly! No registration needed!

Easily generate QR codes for any webpage you visit with Simple QR Code Generator. This handy extension allows you to quickly create QR codes from the URL of your current page, making sharing and downloading effortless.

Key Features:
Instant QR Code Generation: Get a QR code for the current webpage with just one click.
High-Quality Codes: Generates QR codes with high error correction and margins, ensuring they are always scannable.
Easy Sharing: Share the generated QR code directly from the extension using built-in sharing options.
Quick Download: Download your QR code as an image to your device for offline sharing or printing.
Why Choose Simple QR Code Generator?
User-Friendly: Intuitive design for seamless QR code creation.
Fast and Efficient: Generates QR codes instantly without any delay.
Secure: Your data remains private; we only process the URL to create the QR code.
How to Use:
Click on the Simple QR Code Generator icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Instantly see the QR code for the current page's URL.
Click 'Download' to save the QR code image or 'Share' to send it to others.
Perfect for:

Quickly sharing webpages with friends or colleagues.
Printing QR codes for marketing materials.
Saving webpage shortcuts on your mobile device.
Enhance your browsing and sharing experience with Simple QR Code Generator. Download now and start generating QR codes effortlessly!
